transition.script: GoTo("http://www.onlinecharttool.com/graph?selected_graph=line").Click("//*[@class='btn-next']").Click("//*[@id='design-param-dataset_options_line_num_groups']/option[4]").Paste("$maintainabilityIndex").Into("//tr[last()]/td[3]/input").Paste("$physicalLOC").Into("//tr[last()]/td[4]/input").Paste("$logicalLOC").Into("//tr[last()]/td[5]/input").Paste("$aggregateCyclomaticComplexity").Into("//tr[last()]/td[6]/input").Paste("$ScriptName").Into("//tr[last()]/td[2]/input").Paste("$maintainabilityIndexText").Into("//input[@class='text' and @id='design-param-datagroup_options_line_group_label_1']").Paste("$physicalLOCText").Into("//input[@class='text' and @id='design-param-datagroup_options_line_group_label_2']").Paste("$logicalLOCText").Into("//input[@class='text' and @id='design-param-datagroup_options_line_group_label_3']").Paste("$aggregateCyclomaticComplexitytext").Into("//input[@class='text' and @id='design-param-datagroup_options_line_group_label_4']").Click("//select[@class='sel07 dropdown dropdown-num_items num_items' and @id='design-param-dataset_options_line_num_items']/option[@selected]/following-sibling::option[1]").Click("//*[@class='btn-next']").Click("//*[@class='btn-next']");
